items.content_html: GetViewport is a lightweight JavaScript utility for responsive breakpoint detection. It dynamically injects CSS breakpoints and allows JavaScript to check the current viewport size directly. This setup avoids the need for complex SCSS configurations and pseudo-elements, making it simple to integrate into any web project.
items.title: peterbenoit/GetViewport: GetViewport is a lightweight JavaScript utility for responsive breakpoint detection. It dynamically injects CSS breakpoints and allows JavaScript to check the current viewport size directly. This setup avoids the need for complex SCSS configurations and pseudo-elements, making it simple to integrate into any web project.

items.content_html: The LitPlayerYoutube is a video player based on YouTube built with Lit, which uses the official YouTube API to control the video. It is lightweight, customizable, and easy to use both as a pure Web Component and via React with the official wrapper.

items.content_html: HyCom API is a lightweight TypeScript client that simplifies access to the HyCom public API, allowing users to easily fetch authors, posts, and site statistics. 🚀 With its straightforward functions, you can quickly generate QR codes and explore popular tags without hassle. 🐙

items.content_html: A lightweight utility for TypeScript and JavaScript, `@adam-rocska/timeout` creates a Promise that resolves after a set time, perfect for managing delays in your async workflows. Check it out on GitHub for easy integration into your projects! 🐙✨
